content: Hi,I use docker-compose deploy zulip,I build docker image from 2.0.0 version,I found the final files,/home/zulip/deployments/current/templates/zerver/emails/compiled is not use my custom file xxxx.source.html to generate ,the other custom file such as xxx.subject is copied conrrectly.
@Tim Abbott Can you see this?
I can't found tools folder at /home/zulip/deployments/current,where can I found it?
hm, maybe it's not shipped in prod? This may have to wait for Tim to see it.
tools/ isn't shipped in prod. One way to get it is to run scripts/upgrade-using-git but I would recommend using that after we've tried debugging this.

@Return if you want to edit files in Zulip, you should fork zulip.git and point docker-zulip at your fork via the Git repository settings in docker-compose.yml; that will do the tooling properly for this sort of editing.
@Tim Abbott ok, I will try
